verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* fixed \w his|strong="G3956"\w* eyes \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Council|strong="G4892"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w began|strong="G1161"\w*: ‘Brothers, \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* \w part|strong="G1473"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w always|strong="G3956"\w* \w ordered|strong="G3004"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* \w life|strong="G4176"\w* \w before|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w with|strong="G2316"\w* \w a|strong="G1161"\w* clear \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*, up \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w very|strong="G3778"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.’

\w At|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w the|strong="G1161"\w* high priest Ananias \w ordered|strong="G2004"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w standing|strong="G3936"\w* near \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w strike|strong="G5180"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*;

\w The|strong="G1161"\w* \w people|strong="G3004"\w* \w standing|strong="G3936"\w* near \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3588"\w*, ‘\w Do|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* know \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* insulting \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w high|strong="G2316"\w* priest?’

‘\w I|strong="G1063"\w* \w did|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, brothers, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* high priest,’ \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, ‘\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1125"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* – “\w Of|strong="G2992"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ruler \w of|strong="G2992"\w* \w your|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w should|strong="G1492"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* ill”.’

Noticing \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* present \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w others|strong="G2087"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w called|strong="G3972"\w* \w out|strong="G2896"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Council|strong="G4892"\w*, ‘Brothers, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisee|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*. \w It|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w question|strong="G2919"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* resurrection \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w trial|strong="G2919"\w*.’

\w As|strong="G1161"\w* \w soon|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2980"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w a|strong="G1096"\w* dispute \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* \w between|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* sharp division \w of|strong="G2532"\w* opinion \w among|strong="G1096"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w present|strong="G3778"\w*.

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w such|strong="G1161"\w* \w thing|strong="G3004"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* resurrection, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* angel \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w while|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* believe \w in|strong="G3004"\w* \w both|strong="G1161"\w*.)

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w uproar|strong="G2906"\w* ensued, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* Teachers \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* Law belonging \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*’ \w party|strong="G3313"\w* \w stood|strong="G3588"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hotly protested, ‘\w We|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w whatever|strong="G5100"\w* \w wrong|strong="G2556"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w*. \w Suppose|strong="G1487"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* angel…’

\w The|strong="G1519"\w* dispute \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w becoming|strong="G1096"\w* \w so|strong="G1161"\w* violent, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w commanding|strong="G2753"\w* officer, \w fearing|strong="G5399"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w would|strong="G1096"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w torn|strong="G1288"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w pieces|strong="G1288"\w* \w between|strong="G3319"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w ordered|strong="G2753"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* Guard \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* rescue \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w take|strong="G1096"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* Fort.

\w That|strong="G3588"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w came|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stood|strong="G2186"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj ‘\+w Courage|strong="G2293"\+w*! \+w You|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* borne \+w witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w bear|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Rome|strong="G4516"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w*.’\wj*

\w In|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w morning|strong="G2250"\w* \w some|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2453"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* combined \w together|strong="G4963"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w took|strong="G1096"\w* \w an|strong="G1096"\w* oath \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w would|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3383"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w or|strong="G3383"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w had|strong="G3972"\w* killed \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w than|strong="G4183"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w in|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w plot|strong="G4945"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* priests \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w We|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* taken \w a|strong="G2532"\w* solemn oath \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* touch food \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* killed \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* want \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* consent \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Council|strong="G4892"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* suggest \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* commanding officer \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w Paul|strong="G1510"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w though|strong="G5613"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* intended \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G1519"\w* \w more|strong="G1161"\w* fully \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w case|strong="G3588"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w*, \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w comes|strong="G1510"\w* \w here|strong="G1510"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w will|strong="G3195"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w make|strong="G1519"\w* away \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.’

\w However|strong="G1161"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*’s sister, hearing \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* plot, \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Fort, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w being|strong="G2532"\w* admitted, told \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w about|strong="G1519"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* garrison \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* asked \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w take|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w young|strong="G3494"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* commanding officer, \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w something|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* tell \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* centurion \w went|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* commanding officer, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w bring|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w young|strong="G3495"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w something|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w tell|strong="G2980"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.’

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* commanding officer \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w young|strong="G3739"\w* \w man|strong="G3739"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, stepping \w aside|strong="G2596"\w*, \w asked|strong="G4441"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* tell \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

‘\w Some|strong="G5100"\w* \w men|strong="G5100"\w* \w have|strong="G3748"\w* \w agreed|strong="G4934"\w*,’ \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w ask|strong="G2065"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Council|strong="G4892"\w* tomorrow, \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* plea \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w your|strong="G3588"\w* making further inquiry \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w case|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w persuade|strong="G3982"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w than|strong="G4183"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w lying|strong="G1748"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w wait|strong="G1748"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* taken \w an|strong="G2532"\w* oath \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G3568"\w* away \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w at|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w very|strong="G4183"\w* moment \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w readiness|strong="G2092"\w*, counting \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*.’

\w The|strong="G4314"\w* \w commanding|strong="G3853"\w* officer \w then|strong="G3767"\w* dismissed \w the|strong="G4314"\w* \w young|strong="G3495"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*, cautioning \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* mention \w to|strong="G4314"\w* anybody \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* given \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* information.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* Captains, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ordered|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w ready|strong="G2090"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w seventy|strong="G1440"\w* troopers \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* lancers, \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w nine|strong="G5154"\w* o’clock \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w*,

\w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* horses ready \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* ride, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* might \w take|strong="G2443"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w safely|strong="G1295"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*, \w the|strong="G4314"\w* \w Governor|strong="G2232"\w*.
\w He|strong="G3778"\w* also \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w letter|strong="G1992"\w* along \w these|strong="G3778"\w* lines:
